item.title: Sarah add a quote by Pete Jordan
item.description: "I’ve been in Amsterdam, I’ve been able to enjoy many aspects of cycling here. One thing I have not been able to do yet is bike with my sweetheart. But now that you’re here, I’m so excited to ride around town with you among all the thousands of other cyclists while I hold your wrist or you hold mine." -- Pete Jordan

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Barbara "Cutie" Cooper
item.description: "When you work hard, the temptation is to come home and just plotz (which is Jewish for “relax,” or maybe “die,” depending on the context)—to throw your dirty clothes on the floor or hide a mess behind closet doors. This is not a new story." -- Barbara "Cutie" Cooper
